headline: Morgan Stanley Keeps an Overweight Rating on PPL Corporation (PPL)
summary: PPL Corporation (NYSE:PPL) is among the 15 Best Electric Utility Stocks to Invest In Now. PPL Corporation (NYSE:PPL) is among the Best Utility Stocks.
